languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, пилот вашего шаттла докладывает о невозможности оставаться на поверхности Летуса из-за погрузочных работ — это связано с опасностью столкновения с транспортировочными механизмами. Пилот останется на орбите, пока не получится безопасно приземлиться на аванпост Арбитес и принять вас на борт".

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, пилот вашего шаттла докладывает о невозможности оставаться на поверхности Летуса из-за погрузочных работ — это связано с опасностью столкновения с транспортировочными механизмами. Пилот останется на орбите, пока не получится безопасно приземлиться на аванпост Арбитес и принять вас на борт".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface due to the loading activity — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and receive you on board."

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface due to the loading activity — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and receive you on board."

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo-handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo-handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

"Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Pilot Eures Shuttles meldet, dass Euer Shuttle aufgrund der Verladeaktivitäten nicht länger auf Leethus bleiben kann ... das Risiko einer Kollision mit den Verlademechanismen wäre zu hoch. Das Shuttle bleibt im Orbit, bis es gefahrlos auf dem Außenposten der Arbites landen kann, um Euch an Bord zu nehmen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Pilot Eures Shuttles meldet, dass Euer Shuttle aufgrund der Verladeaktivitäten nicht länger auf Leethus bleiben kann ... das Risiko einer Kollision mit den Verlademechanismen wäre zu hoch. Das Shuttle bleibt im Orbit, bis es gefahrlos auf dem Außenposten der Arbites landen kann, um Euch an Bord zu nehmen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le pilote de votre navette a signalé qu'il ne pouvait plus rester à la surface de Leethus pendant le processus de chargement, en raison des risques de collision avec les mécanismes transportant la cargaison. La navette restera donc en orbite jusqu'à ce qu'elle puisse se poser à l'avant-poste de l'Arbites pour vous permettre d'embarquer. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le pilote de votre navette a signalé qu'il ne pouvait plus rester à la surface de Leethus pendant le processus de chargement, en raison des risques de collision avec les mécanismes transportant la cargaison. La navette restera donc en orbite jusqu'à ce qu'elle puisse se poser à l'avant-poste de l'Arbites pour vous permettre d'embarquer. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，穿梭机驾驶员报告说，由于装载工作正在进行，穿梭机目前无法继续停留在利瑟斯地表，因为可能会与货运机械发生相撞事故。穿梭机会始终保持轨道飞行状态，直到法务部哨站内部可以安全降落为止。在此之后，您就可以顺利登机了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，穿梭机驾驶员报告说，由于装载工作正在进行，穿梭机目前无法继续停留在利瑟斯地表，因为可能会与货运机械发生相撞事故。穿梭机会始终保持轨道飞行状态，直到法务部哨站内部可以安全降落为止。在此之后，您就可以顺利登机了。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el piloto de su lanzadera afirma que la actividad de carga obliga a la lanzadera a abandonar la superficie de Leethus. Existe un riesgo de colisión con los mecanismos de manipulación de carga. La lanzadera seguirá en órbita hasta que pueda aterrizar en el puesto avanzado del Arbites para recibirle».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el piloto de su lanzadera afirma que la actividad de carga obliga a la lanzadera a abandonar la superficie de Leethus. Existe un riesgo de colisión con los mecanismos de manipulación de carga. La lanzadera seguirá en órbita hasta que pueda aterrizar en el puesto avanzado del Arbites para recibirle».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、シャトルパイロットから報告です。現在の積み込み作業により、シャトルをリーザスの地表に留めておくのは困難とのことです。貨物取扱装置との衝突リスクがあるためです。シャトルは軌道上で待機し、高等裁定局の前哨基地に安全に着陸でき次第、あなたをお迎えいたします」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、シャトルパイロットから報告です。現在の積み込み作業により、シャトルをリーザスの地表に留めておくのは困難とのことです。貨物取扱装置との衝突リスクがあるためです。シャトルは軌道上で待機し、高等裁定局の前哨基地に安全に着陸でき次第、あなたをお迎えいたします」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, mekik pilotunuz yükleme faaliyetleri nedeniyle mekiği Leethus'ın yüzeyinde tutmanın artık mümkün olmadığını bildiriyor. Kargo taşıma mekanizmalarıyla çarpışma riski mevcutmuş. Mekik, Arbites karakoluna güvenli bir şekilde inip sizi gemiye alana dek yörüngede kalacak."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your shuttle pilot reports that due to the loading activity, it is no longer possible to keep the shuttle on Leethus's surface — there is a risk of collision with the cargo handling mechanisms. The shuttle will remain in orbit until it can safely land at the Arbites outpost and take you aboard."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, mekik pilotunuz yükleme faaliyetleri nedeniyle mekiği Leethus'ın yüzeyinde tutmanın artık mümkün olmadığını bildiriyor. Kargo taşıma mekanizmalarıyla çarpışma riski mevcutmuş. Mekik, Arbites karakoluna güvenli bir şekilde inip sizi gemiye alana dek yörüngede kalacak."
